name: The Colorful Creature (Demo)
description:
This is a basic and fun Platformer.

The concept is that you can stay on blocks as long as they are the same color as you. There are also items that you can collect to change colors. And a ton more stuff. Here are the features in the game:

- Over 60 levels.

- Challenges

- In-Game Level Editor

- Skins

- Hard Mode

- And Fun!

The full version may be in 2020. Depending on my efficency of work. This is my first itch.io submission to the site, please give it support if you do love this concept.
